sense.def: Pathological Condition of cu si 卒死 , sudden [appearance of] death, resulting from an extreme exposure to heat or sunlight. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 28: 文仲療夏月暍死方。濃煮蓼汁 , 灌 三升 , 不瘥更灌之 , “Recipe by Wenzhong to cure [appearance of] death from sunstroke in summer. Boil the juice of knotweed down to a viscous liquid, and forcibly instill 3 sheng [into the patient]. If this does not cure him, forcibly instill again”.
